clean_data: Web Developer span lWebspan span lDeveloperspan Web Developer Hobby at Home North Middletown NJ Looking for a job where I can use my strong experience with LAMP stack Work Experience Web Developer Hobby at Home 2012 to Present Driven by great passion patience and problem solving skills I have learned object oriented PHP and MySQL My latest project is a core MVC web app with pretty URLs I have it in four levels of user authentication level 0 has no authentication and is useful for simple dynamic websites level 1 has only one user access that can add comments and change user information level 2 has an admin that can add and manage new users and users that can add comments and change their user information level 3 has a webmaster that can add and manage new admins then the admins can add and manage new users then the users that can add comments and change their user information The access is done using either user id or email address The passwords are hashed the remembermetokens are hashed and salted the forms have CSRF and XSS protection and the login part has bruteforce hacking protection I used this as the core for the full scale online study tool for my chemistry students at httpsmrpavelus PHP Web Developer Self starter Middletown NJ 2009 to Present 2009 Present Linux Power User Installed and customized Linux Debian Ubuntu Kali and Arch on computer workstations servers laptops virtual machines VirtualBoxVagrant and Raspberry Pi Strong knowledge on LAMP stack installation and setup for multiple Internet domains with FTP using MySQL as backend Mail server with multiple users and domains using MySQL as backend Experience with IDEs such as Eclipse NetBeans Android Studio and Geany Bash shell scripting for backup update and blazing fast installation of web FTP and mail servers Skills Javascript Bootstrap Object oriented Php Scripting Lamp stack Lamp Linux Shell scripting Mysql Angularjs Html5 Ftp jquery Mail server HTML Assessments
